info.task: navigate from dropdown to collapsed disclosure button
info.title: Navigate from a dropdown to a collapsed disclosure button in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstLinkInDropdown
setupScript.description: sets the state of the first disclosure button to expanded, and sets focus on the first link of the associated dropdown

user: With focus on a link in the first dropdown, close the dropdown and return focus to the associated disclosure button.
instructions.raw: With focus on a link in the first dropdown, close the dropdown and return focus to the associated disclosure button.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: State of the button (collapsed) is conveyed
